      • Restaurant

        public Restaurant​(double m,
                  int cc,
                  int d)
        Constructor, Generates and prepares the world.
        Parameters:
        m - The amount of money the player has.
        cc - The number of customers the player has served.
        d - The lenght of an in-game day.

      • getPlate

        public int getPlate​(java.lang.String attribute)
        This method returns attributes of the plate object, that the actors can then use.
        Parameters:
        attribute - Which attribute should be returned. Accepted are: "x", "y", "width" and "height"
        Returns:
        The selected attribute of the object
